page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content:
{A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KAREN WILLAMS}
I get up at 7.45,I go to the loo,and get dressed.I go down stairs and get the breakfast things ready.At 8.25 I go to the bus stop and wait for the bus.I arrive at school at 8.45,that gives me quarter of an hour playtime. I normally play tick with Donna and Alison.The bell goes at 9.00 and we go in for assembly.The morning whizzes past by working on the Domesday project.At 10.40 we have playtime until 10.55 we work until 12.00.At 12.00 we have our dinner.We then have 30 minutes playtime until 1.00.We sometimes have athelics and maths in the afternoon.Then we pack up and go home.I have a snack at home,and then play with Daniel until supper time, after I watch television until bedtime.
